name: Wybie's Kingdom
description:
Wybie's Kingdom!

another game i made in adobe flash 10 and scratch 2.0!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story:

Duncan the player has traveled to a weird looking castle in the forest

he goes to the castle not only to find apples with healing liquid on top of it

but theres also enemy's he has to avoid!

defeat the final boss of the game and you win!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

note: you can play the game online or download the game and play it

your choice :T

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Attack

Up Arrow Key - Jump
